definition: typical or distinctive, a distinguishing quality
details:
adjective
- typical or distinctive
= example: typical or distinctive
noun
- a distinguishing quality
= synonyms: distinction
- any measurable property of a device measured under closely specified conditions
= synonyms: device characteristic
- a prominent attribute or aspect of something
= synonyms: feature
- the integer part (positive or negative) of the representation of a logarithm
= example: the integer part (positive or negative) of the representation of a logarithm
